page.title: 17The M.O.D.Range,Dundrennan
page.content: The range employs 100 civilians and 40 soldiers.My dad is a duty driver,and sometimes drives to Glasgow,Edinburgh or London. The range tests tanks.The tanks new firing point is at Brown Hill.You can see the lights at night.The tanks fire three times a week. When the tanks are firing the red flags fly,and the road down to the shore at Burnfoot is closed. We often see the big lorries,with the tanks on top,coming through the village.A landrover drives in front to warn other drivers that a wide load is approaching.
